channel.title: LA Clippers Fan Podcast
channel.description: Get a fan's view on the Los Angeles Clippers.
channel.itunes:subtitle: A fan podcast on everything about the Los Angeles Clippers.
channel.itunes:summary: Stan, an avid fan, gives you regular updates and commentary on the state of the Los Angeles Clippers. Listeners are encouraged to log on to www.hoopspodcast.com and leave any questions or comments for future episodes. E-mail the show at stan@hoopspodcast.com
channel.itunes:keywords: Clippers Los Angeles LA Lakers NBA basketball Elton Brand Corey Maggette Sam Cassell Mobley Kaman Livingston Singleton
channel.itunes:author: Stan the Clippers Fan

item.itunes:author: Stan
